response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Recognizing its potential worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a strategic price of $1,100,000. This exceptional opportunity not only secures your acquisition of a valuable asset but also allows me to maximize the return on this significant item. I look forward to discussing the details and welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product.", "product_price": 1100000}
